name: Computer Call
tagline: A low cost UK based call centre.
description:
Computercall is a low cost UK based call centre offering a seamless service 24 hours a day every day of the year. Our clients receive a reliable and consistent service which allows them to concentrate on their core business. The Company was established in 1976 to offer call handling services to small companies. Since then we have continuously strived to improve our services to include end-to-end call management services for any type of industry.
Based near Heathrow Airport, our Control Centre currently handles mission critical calls on behalf of more than 80 clients. Our switchboard and incoming lines have full Telecom Total Care support and clients are given emergency back-up numbers to ensure continuity of service in the event of the failure of a particular line. We pride ourselves in answering 95% of our calls within 12 seconds.
